${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.NAME: Two Amount Power
${ModID}:ExampleTwoAmountPowerCard.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, gain !M! Strength and !${ModID}:m2! Dexterity.

${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.NAME: Inline Power
${ModID}:InlinePowerDemo.DESCRIPTION: Strikes deal !M! more damage. NL At the end of your turn, gain !M! Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: additional damage. At the end of your turn, gain #b

${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.NAME: Cool Card Stuff
${ModID}:SelectCardsPlusCardMods.DESCRIPTION: Choose from 1 of 3 cost 0 cards from any class. NL Add it into your hand. NL It gains Ethereal and Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose a card to add into your hand with Ethereal and Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.NAME: Easy X Cost
${ModID}:EasyXCostDemo.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage X{!M!|>0=+!M!} times. NL Gain X{!M!|>0=+!M!} Strength. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.NAME: Easy Modal Choice
${ModID}:EasyModalChoiceDemo.DESCRIPTION: Choose one: Draw !M! cards or gain !${ModID}:m2! Strength.

${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.NAME: Draw and Shiv
${ModID}:DrawAndShiv.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 card. NL Add 1 *Shiv into your hand.

${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.NAME: Two Damage Values
${ModID}:TwoTypesOfDamage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If you're Vulnerable, deal !${ModID}:sd! damage instead.

${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.NAME: Startup And AOE
${ModID}:StartupBlockCard.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Startup: Gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.NAME: Previews and Callbacks
${ModID}:MultiCardPreviewAndDrawCallback.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Shuffle *Smite{!Upgrades!|>0=+} and *Safety{!Upgrades!|>0=+} into your draw pile. NL Draw 1 card. NL If it's Colorless, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

${ModID}:Pillage.NAME: Pillage
${ModID}:Pillage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Add 1 *Treasure into your hand.

${ModID}:Treasure.NAME: Treasure
${ModID}:Treasure.DESCRIPTION: Make !M! energy. NL Retain. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Sail.NAME: Sail
${ModID}:Sail.DESCRIPTION: Draw 1 Card. Add 1 *Treasure into your hand.

${ModID}:Grapeshot.NAME: Grapeshot
${ModID}:Grapeshot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies 3 times. NL Ethereal.

${ModID}:Brace.NAME: Brace
${ModID}:Brace.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Plunder: Gain !M! Block instead.

${ModID}:Loot.NAME: Loot!
${ModID}:Loot.DESCRIPTION: Return all Treasure cards from your Exhaust pile to your hand. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:CripplingShot.NAME: Crippling Shot
${ModID}:CripplingShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply 1 Weak. NL Apply !M! Bleed.

${ModID}:Pierce.NAME: Pierce
${ModID}:Pierce.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Plunder: Deal !M! damage instead.

${ModID}:Taunt.NAME: Taunt
${ModID}:Taunt.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:Deal.NAME: Deal
${ModID}:Deal.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Plunder: Draw !${ModID}:m2! cards instead.

${ModID}:HeavyShot.NAME: Heavy Shot
${ModID}:HeavyShot.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Plunder: Deal !M! damage instead.

${ModID}:EmptyTheVault.NAME: Empty the Vault
${ModID}:EmptyTheVault.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all *Treasure in your hand. Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies for each card Exhausted. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:TreasureArmor.NAME: Treasure Armor
${ModID}:TreasureArmor.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a *Treasure is Exhausted, gain !M! Block.

${ModID}:Leech.NAME: Leech
${ModID}:Leech.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Bleed. NL Enemy doesn't lose Bleed this turn.

${ModID}:CashIn.NAME: Cash In
${ModID}:CashIn.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all *Treasure in your hand. Gain !M! gold for each Exhausted card. NL Exhaust.

${ModID}:SliceAndDice.NAME: Slice and Dice
${ModID}:SliceAndDice.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Bleed to ALL enemies. NL Create 2 Knives.

${ModID}:GhostlyRemains.NAME: Ghostly Remains
${ModID}:GhostlyRemains.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card with Ethereal, make a *Treasure.
